participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Passionate and expressive, Lila loves to share her interests with others and is always open to new experiences.
participant_1.background: I love the way my pets stare back at me. I love to dance salsa. I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner. I sometimes scratch my nose for fun. I love the band Van Halen.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and humorous, Jordan values his friendships and enjoys reflecting on life's quirks.
participant_2.background: I'm smart enough to know that weather doesn't care about my problems. I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin. I think I need Botox soon. I don't care what color my hair is as long as I can keep acting. I am an award-winning 4H member.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
I'm pretty good. How about you?
I'm doing alright. I just got done dancing salsa.
Oh, that's cool. I've never really been into dancing.
Oh, it's so much fun. You should try it sometime.
Maybe I will. I'm not sure if I'd be any good at it, though.
You don't have to be good at it to have fun. It's just about moving your body and having a good time.
I guess you're right. I might give it a try sometime.
That's great! I'm sure you'd love it.
Well, I'm glad you're enjoying it. What's your favorite part about it?
I love the way it makes me feel. It's so freeing and exhilarating. I just feel like I can let go of everything and be myself.
That sounds really nice. I could use something like that in my life.
You should definitely give it a try. I think you'd like it.
I'll keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. I'm always happy to talk about dancing.
I can tell. You seem really passionate about it.
I am. It's a big part of my life.
I'm glad you have something that you're so passionate about. It's important to have things that make you happy.
Thanks. I agree.
So, what are some other things you like to do?
I also like to play video games, watch movies, and read.
Oh, me too! I love video games. What kind do you play?
I mostly play action and adventure games. I love the feeling of being immersed in a different world.
I love that feeling too. It's like you can escape from your own life for a little while.
Exactly! That's why I love it so much.
So, what are some of your favorite games?
I love the Uncharted series, the Last of Us, and the God of War games.
Oh, I love those games too!
We should play together sometime.
I'd love that!
Great! I'll give you my gamer tag.
Awesome! I'll add you.
Cool
